card.name: Coffin
card.description: {{KW:MAGIC}}: Look at 2 others cheapest monsters with a {{COST}} lower than the elapsed turn count in your dustpile and choose one. {{KW:DUST}}: Release it.

description.now: {{KW:MAGIC}}: Look at 2 others cheapest monsters with a {{COST}} lower than the elapsed turn count in your dustpile and choose one. {{KW:DUST}}: Release it.
description.prev: {{KW:DUST}}: Summon the cheapest dead ally monster (except itself) and remove it from your dustpile.
